titles.title: Jesus Christ in me
I Know there is a purpose, Jesus Christ in me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know there's a purpose
I know there's a plan
I know it's a process, no bed of roses
I understand
I know there's a reason
Why I came to be
So that in time others could find
Jesus in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I know I'm not perfect
I know I'm a sinner
But He says I'm worth it
He calls me perfect
He says I'm a winner
Because of Jesus, I am free
Free to discover, the greatest Lover
Jesus in me

verse.lines:

Jesus Christ in me

Jesus Christ in me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Made in His image
That is His dream
He takes His time, for you and I
To become more like Him
That is the reason
Why I came to be
So that in time others could find
Jesus in me
